about_the_game: Maker Madness is a 3D printing farm simulation game. Start in your bedroom with a single 3D printer, and work your way up to your own printing factory. Finish projects commissioned by customers to earn coin, and use it to upgrade your own operation. Earn enough coin to buy a new space and hold more machines. Repair customer's projects to earn more bolts, which can be used to upgrade your existing machines.

short_description: Build your own 3D PRINTING FARM in Maker Madness! Start from a humble beginning in your bedroom, and expand all the way to your own factory. Print projects for customers to upgrade your operation. Buy new machines, and expand your own space to increase production.
